content.text:
# Casualty of war

Casualty of war or Casualties of war may refer to:
*Casualties of War, a 1989 film directed by Brian De Palma
*Casualties of War (Doctor Who), a 2000 novel by Steve Emmerson
*"Casualties of War" (''Foyle's War), a 2007 television episode
*Casualties of War (album), a 2007 album, or the title song, by Boot Camp Clik
*"Casualties of War", a 1992 song by Eric B. & Rakim from Don't Sweat the Technique
*"Casualties of War", a 2012 song by Gossip from A Joyful Noise''
See also
Statistics
* :Category:War casualties by war
Related terms
* Casualty (person)
* Civilian casualties
* Collateral damage
* Conflict epidemiology
* Fragging
* Friendly fire
